title: Bruegel's people
creator_credit: Robert W Gutteridge and Vox Productions
brief_description: Presents the work of the Flemish painter Pieter Bruegel the Elder. Summarises the sources of the emotions, expressed on the faces of Bruegels people, pointing out the civil strife, tyranny, and religious repression prevalent in Flemish society of Bruegel’s time. Narrated by Raymond Wilcox.
